cards.flavor:
"On every plane, there are those who run toward danger."
—Gideon Jura
cards.name: Act of Heroism
cards.text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.

cards.flavor: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."
cards.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
cards.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

cards.flavor: "Many must die for the one who should not have perished."
cards.name: Akroma's Vengeance
cards.text:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.
cards.name: Angelic Page
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Armageddon
cards.text: Destroy all lands.

cards.flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."
cards.name: Auramancer
cards.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn."
—Elder Rimheit
cards.name: Cloudshift
cards.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor:
"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
—Song of All, canto 642
cards.name: Congregate
cards.text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive."
—Kjeldor: Ice Civilization
cards.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
cards.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

cards.flavor: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."
cards.name: Dauntless Cathar
cards.text: {1}{W}, Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Decree of Justice
cards.text:
Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

cards.flavor:
"The tools of evil are mere things. And like all things, they cannot last forever."
—Song of All, canto 881
cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.
cards.name: Fencing Ace
cards.text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

cards.name: Fiend Hunter
cards.text:
When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.
When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.flavor:
"The battle is won. There's work to be done. / The Blessed Sleep must wait. / A fiend is about. It stalks the devout. / I'll save them from my fate."
—"The Good Geist's Vow"
cards.name: Geist of the Moors
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.
cards.name: Gods Willing
cards.text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.
cards.name: Griffin Protector
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Karona's Zealot
cards.text:
Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Karona's Zealot is turned face up, all damage that would be dealt to it this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

cards.flavor: The Order of the Skyward Eye does the bidding of an evil force, unwittingly stirring fear and mistrust across Bant in accordance with his plans.
cards.name: Knight of the Skyward Eye
cards.text: {3}{G}: Knight of the Skyward Eye gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

cards.flavor:
"Such a lord as this—all virtues' height—
Had never been, nor ever was again."
cards.name: Kongming, "Sleeping Dragon"
cards.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."
cards.name: Kor Firewalker

Protection from red
Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: His watch ends only when he does.
cards.name: Loyal Sentry

cards.name: Luminarch Ascension
cards.text:
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Luminarch Ascension. (Damage causes loss of life.)
{1}{W}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if Luminarch Ascension has four or more quest counters on it.

cards.flavor:
"A boon from the angels should never be cast aside."
—Manfried Ulmach, Chief Inquisitor

Enchant creature

Vigilance

cards.flavor: The gods are fascinated by innocence, perhaps because it's a quality they themselves lack.

cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Ordeal of Heliod
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

cards.flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.
cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

cards.flavor: As Hedrax stepped into oblivion, he welcomed the unwavering silence.

cards.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

cards.flavor: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."
cards.name: Promise of Bunrei
cards.text: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

cards.flavor: Skepticism fades in the face of the miraculous.

cards.text:
You gain 6 life.
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Renewed Faith, you may gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.
cards.name: Rest in Peace
cards.text:
When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

cards.flavor:
"One alone is fearsome; one among many is unstoppable."
—Benalish proverb
cards.name: Savannah Lions

cards.text:
Flying
When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.flavor: "Thraben is our home and I will not see it fall to this unhallowed horde."

First strike

cards.flavor:
"Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves."
—Vennick of the Gateless
cards.name: Urbis Protector
cards.text: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: There's no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.
cards.name: Valor in Akros
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."
cards.name: Whitemane Lion
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."
—Takara, to Eladamri

cards.name: Arcane Denial
cards.text:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.flavor: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.
cards.name: Bident of Thassa
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

cards.flavor: Nothing escapes a sharp mind.
cards.name: Blue Elemental Blast
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target red spell.

cards.flavor:
"The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it."
—Pelyus, vedalken ordinar

cards.text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

cards.flavor: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.
cards.name: Borrowing 100,000 Arrows
cards.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

"She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."
—Jori En, expedition leader

Enchant creature

cards.flavor: "Of all the things that can be stolen, opportunity is the most valuable."

cards.flavor:
"Terrifying, but thankfully temporary."

cards.flavor: No tactic transforms a battle like a well-timed carnivore.

cards.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

Enchant creature

cards.flavor: Going down with the ship is just the beginning.

cards.text:
Flying
{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.

cards.flavor: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

cards.text: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.

0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: "You can become anything if I just put my mind to it."

cards.flavor: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

cards.flavor:
"No matter how busy my schedule gets, I always try to take time for that personal touch."

—Sheoldred, Whispering One

cards.flavor:

—Keld Triumphant

cards.flavor:

"The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."
